description: A delicious, flavourful and spicy South Asian lamb curry, that goes well with rice, flat bread or bread. Ideal for a cosy family dinner, on a chilly evening!
name: South Asian Style Lamb Curry Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Cut the meat into small pieces and add the chilli powder, turmeric and salt.
Mix all together and keep aside to marinate for at least 1 hour, or overnight in the fridge.
Heat (medium heat) oil in a pan, add the cardamom pods and the cinnamon stick.
Add the marinated lamb, curry powder, coriander powder, coconut milk, and water. Stir until they are mixed well.
Cover and cook for 30 minutes, or until the gravy thickens and the meat is tender.
Finally add curry leaves and turn off the heat.
Then add the sliced onion, and cook until the onions are brown. Now add the ginger and garlic paste.
Slice up both the capsicums into small pieces (the size can be according to your preference), and add to the pan halfway through the cooking process.
